attributes.action: restrict punitive charges imposed by taxpayer-backed banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Supreme Court has blocked the case brought by the OFT seeking the restriction and repayment of punitive bank charges, which can be many times the administrative cost actually incurred by the bank, although further legal action is possible.  We call upon the Prime Minister to restrict and limit this practice for banks which have been 'bailed out' and are majority-owned by the taxpayer and in which the government has the ability to intervene.
